mapper.select: select site_id,type_no,site_name,address,site_status,substr(start_date,0,8) as start_date from site where site_id = #{site_id}

select x.rnum, x.* from (select rownum as rnum, p.* from (select c.board_no, m.name, c.user_id, c.title,c.reg_date,c.board_status,c.site_name from (select board_no,check_board.user_id, check_board.title, substr(check_board.reg_date,0,14) as reg_date,check_board.board_status,check_board.site_id, site.site_name from check_board,site where check_board.site_id = site.site_id and check_board.site_id = #{site_id}) c,member m where c.user_id = m.user_id order by reg_date desc) p where rownum < #{paging.endnum}) x where x.rnum >= #{paging.startnum} order by x.reg_date desc
select name,tel,company,alarm_m_no from alarm_member where site_id = #{site_id}
select alarm_no,site_id,alarm_content,substr(alarm_time,0,14) as alarm_time,send_user from alarm where site_id = #{site_id}
select count(site_id) from site
select count(site_id) from check_board where site_id = #{site_id}

select x.* from (select rownum as rnum,site_id,type_no,site_name,address,site_status,substr(start_date,0,14) as start_date, before_num from (select rownum as before_num, s.* from (select * from site order by site_status desc)s)a where a.before_num < ${endnum}) x where x.before_num >= ${startnum}
select site_status from site where site_id = #{site_id}
select * from site s,network n where s.site_id = n.site_id and s.site_id = #{site_id}
mapper.update: update site set type_no = #{type_no}, site_name = #{site_name}, address = #{address} where site_id = #{site_id}
update network set sig_protocol = 'tcp', host_ip = #{host_ip}, sig_port_num = #{sig_port_num}, port_num = #{port_num} where site_id = #{site_id}
update alarm_member set tel=#{tel}, name=#{name}, company=#{company} where alarm_m_no=#{alarm_m_no}
mapper.select: select sensor_kind, count(*) as count from my_sensor group by sensor_kind
select * from site

select x.* from (select rownum as rnum,site_id,type_no,site_name,address,site_status,substr(start_date,0,14) as start_date, before_num from (select rownum as before_num, s.* from (select * from site where ${Search.searchType} LIKE '%' || '${Search.keyword}' || '%' order by site_status desc)s)a where a.before_num < ${Paging.endnum}) x where x.before_num >= ${Paging.startnum}

select c.board_no, m.name, c.user_id, c.title,c.reg_date,c.board_status,c.site_name from (select board_no,check_board.user_id, check_board.title, substr(check_board.reg_date,0,14) as reg_date,check_board.board_status,check_board.site_id, site.site_name from check_board,site where check_board.site_id = site.site_id and check_board.site_id = ${site_id}) c,member m where c.user_id = m.user_id and ${searchType} LIKE '%' || '${keyword}' || '%' order by reg_date desc

select x.rnum, x.* from (select rownum as rnum, p.* from (select c.board_no, m.name, c.user_id, c.title,c.reg_date,c.board_status,c.site_name from (select board_no,check_board.user_id, check_board.title, substr(check_board.reg_date,0,14) as reg_date,check_board.board_status,check_board.site_id, site.site_name from check_board,site where check_board.site_id = site.site_id and check_board.site_id = ${Search.site_id} ) c,member m where c.user_id = m.user_id and ${Search.searchType} LIKE '%' || '${Search.keyword}' || '%' order by reg_date desc) p where rownum < #{Paging.endnum}) x where x.rnum >= #{Paging.startnum} order by x.reg_date desc
select site_name from site where site_id = #{site_id}

select x.rnum, x.* from (select rownum as rnum, p.* from (select m.sensor_sn, m.model_name, m.sensor_kind, m.manufacturer, m.voltage, substr(create_day,0,14) as create_day from install_sensor i, my_sensor m where i.site_id = #{site_id} and i.sensor_sn = m.sensor_sn order by create_day desc) p where rownum < #{paging.endnum}) x where x.rnum >= #{paging.startnum} order by x.create_day desc
select count(site_id) from install_sensor where site_id = #{site_id}

select my_sensor.sensor_sn, my_sensor.model_name, my_sensor.sensor_kind, my_sensor.manufacturer, my_sensor.voltage, substr(my_sensor.create_day,0,14) as create_day, install_sensor.site_id from my_sensor FULL OUTER JOIN install_sensor on my_sensor.sensor_sn = install_sensor.sensor_sn where site_id = ${site_id} and ${searchType} LIKE '%' || '${keyword}' || '%'

select x.rnum, x.* from ( select rownum as rnum, p.* from ( select c.sensor_sn, c.model_name, c.sensor_kind, c.manufacturer, c.voltage, c.create_day, c.site_id, s.site_name from (select my_sensor.sensor_sn, my_sensor.model_name, my_sensor.sensor_kind, my_sensor.manufacturer, my_sensor.voltage, substr(my_sensor.create_day,0,14) as create_day, install_sensor.site_id from my_sensor FULL OUTER JOIN install_sensor on my_sensor.sensor_sn = install_sensor.sensor_sn where site_id = ${Search.site_id} and ${Search.searchType} LIKE '%' || '${Search.keyword}' || '%') c LEFT OUTER JOIN site s on c.site_id = s.site_id order by create_day desc ) p where rownum < #{Paging.endnum}) x where x.rnum >= #{Paging.startnum} order by x.create_day desc
select DISTINCT sensor_name from sensor_date where site_id = #{site_id} and sensor_name not like '%volt%' order by CASE WHEN sensor_name IN ('PTemp') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, sensor_name asc
select DISTINCT sensor_name from sensor_date where site_id = #{site_id} and sensor_name not like '%volt%' order by CASE WHEN sensor_name IN ('PTemp') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, sensor_name asc
select cur_date, sensor_name, sensing_data from sensor_date where site_id = #{site_id} and sensor_name not like '%volt%' order by sensor_data_num desc
select * from site where site_name LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
